snippet: The Media Decoder blog reports that Andrew Breitbart, a conservative blogger and activist who became well known for publishing undercover videos and revealing photographs aimed at liberals and Democrats, died Thursday. He was 43.
abstract: The Media Decoder blog reports that Andrew Breitbart, a conservative blogger and activist who became well known for publishing undercover videos and revealing photographs aimed at liberals and Democrats, died Thursday. He was 43.

headline.main: Andrew Breitbart, Conservative Blogger, Dies at 43
